definitions.definition: Characterized by or exhibiting petty bad temper, bad-tempered, moody, cross.
definitions.example: I would rather figure things out on my own than ask that peevish librarian for help.
Peevish patients in the doctor's waiting room.

definitions.definition: Easily annoyed, especially by things that are not important; irritable, querulous.
Sharp, piercing, bitter (of the wind); windy, blustery (of the weather).
Perverse, refractory; headstrong, obstinate; capricious, skittish; (also) coy.
Beside oneself; out of one's senses; mad.
